newsitem.title: UK: Most March Forties loadings deferred one day-trade.
newsitem.headline: Most March Forties loadings deferred one day-trade.

text.p: Most North Sea Forties crude loadings in March have been delayed by one day, said one equity holder.
"Most of the cargoes have been deferred one day and some have been reduced," he said.
He said that one lifter has had two 600,000 barrel end-March cargoes reduced to 500,000 barrels each.
Traders said they had heard rumours of production problems at the Nelson and Miller fields in the Forties system.
"I don't know any details about production problems," said the equity holder.
